messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] BJU curriculum
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/23/02 1:05:06 PM Central Daylight Time, ... LOL! Yes, I think they do like to think of themselves as the BIG Jesus University!  ;o)
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/23/02 1:05:06 PM Central Daylight Time,
windystreet@... writes:

> ***BJU curriculum***
>
> Ok, I Googled it and found it what it real stands for (Bob Jones
> University).
>
> But when I first saw it written with the other Christian curriculums,
> the first thing that came to my head was "Big Jesus Unversity."
>
> Laughing is a great way to start the day, thanks
>
>

LOL! Yes, I think they do like to think of themselves as the BIG Jesus
University! <veg>
;o)
~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: BJU curriculum
messages.msgSnippet: ***BJU curriculum*** Ok, I Googled it and found it what it real stands for (Bob Jones University). But when I first saw it written with the other Christian
messages.messageBody:
***BJU curriculum***

Ok, I Googled it and found it what it real stands for (Bob Jones
University).

But when I first saw it written with the other Christian curriculums,
the first thing that came to my head was "Big Jesus Unversity."

Laughing is a great way to start the day, thanks

Kate
